long_description: The Marin Bayview Trail 24 in. girls' bike introduces your little speedster to the fun of off-pavement pedaling. 6061 aluminum frame is double-butted to strengthen joints; lowered top tube makes for easier mounts and dismounts. SR Suntour M-3020 suspension fork provides 50mm of travel to soften the ride, helping the rider maintain control of the bike; springs are optimized for small riders. Truvativ triple crankset and 7-speed cassette make climbing easy thanks to the 21 gear combinations. Shimano EZ-FIRE Plus shifters provide intuitive shifting action; linear-pull hand brakes offer controlled deceleration. Kenda tires deliver a stable ride and are suitable for both on- and off-road travel. Specs on the Marin Bayview Trail 24 in. girls' bike are subject to change.
